question: How many treatments do I need for laser hair removal?
answer: The number of treatments varies depending on the area being treated, your hair type, and individual hair growth cycles. Most clients need between 8 and 12 sessions for the best results, spaced about 4 to 6 weeks apart. Some areas or hair types may require occasional maintenance treatments.
After completing the full course, we usually recommend one maintenance (touch-up) session per year to keep your skin smooth and prevent new hair growth.
